com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures

Class UVCoordinatesGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures.UVCoordinatesGenerator

  • public class UVCoordinatesGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for UV coordinates generation.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

    • Method Detail

      • generateUVCoordinatesFor2DTexture

        public static java.util.List<com.jme3.math.Vector2f> generateUVCoordinatesFor2DTexture(com.jme3.scene.Mesh mesh,
                                                                                       UVCoordinatesGenerator.UVCoordinatesType texco,
                                                                                       com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures.UVProjectionGenerator.UVProjectionType projection,
                                                                                       com.jme3.scene.Geometry geometries)
        Generates a UV coordinates for 2D texture.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh we generate UV's for
        texco - UV coordinates type
        projection - projection type
        geometries - the geometris the given mesh belongs to (required to compute bounding box)
        Returns:
        UV coordinates for the given mesh

      • generateUVCoordinatesFor3DTexture

        public static java.util.List<com.jme3.math.Vector3f> generateUVCoordinatesFor3DTexture(com.jme3.scene.Mesh mesh,
                                                                                       UVCoordinatesGenerator.UVCoordinatesType texco,
                                                                                       int[] coordinatesSwappingIndexes,
                                                                                       com.jme3.scene.Geometry... geometries)
        Generates a UV coordinates for 3D texture.
        Parameters:
        mesh - the mesh we generate UV's for
        texco - UV coordinates type
        coordinatesSwappingIndexes - coordinates swapping indexes
        geometries - the geometris the given mesh belongs to (required to compute bounding box)
        Returns:
        UV coordinates for the given mesh

      • isTextureCoordinateTypeSupported

        public static boolean isTextureCoordinateTypeSupported(UVCoordinatesGenerator.UVCoordinatesType texco)
        This method should be used to determine if the texture will ever be computed. If the texture coordinates are not supported then the try of flattening the texture might result in runtime exceptions occurence.
        Parameters:
        texco - the texture coordinates type
        Returns:
        true if the type is supported and false otherwise

      • getBoundingBox

        public static com.jme3.bounding.BoundingBox getBoundingBox(com.jme3.scene.Geometry... geometries)
        This method returns the bounding box of the given geometries.
        Parameters:
        geometries - the list of geometries
        Returns:
        bounding box of the given geometries
